name: force
creator: Sencha
summary: Connector interface and sample Sencha Touch apps that demonstrate integration with SalesForce's Force.com API.
detailedDescription: The connector package contains a Proxy that can be used with Sencha Touch Stores, DataViews and ListViews. The package also contains a sample app that can be easily deployed to a hosting environment (e.g. heroku) in order to host the application and provide a proxy connection to force.com.
